meanings.definition: A class of drugs that lower cholesterol levels in the blood.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed a statin to help reduce my cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent2: Taking a statin every day can help keep your heart healthy.
meanings.sent3: The statin worked like a superhero, fighting off the bad cholesterol in my body.
meanings.sent4: The statin was a knight in shining armor, battling against high cholesterol.
meanings.sent5: The statin pill was like a tiny warrior fighting the cholesterol dragon in my bloodstream.

meanings.definition: Any drug that inhibits the enzyme HMG-CoA reductase, used to lower cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent1: She remembered to take her statin before bedtime to control her cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: The statin medication helped regulate his cholesterol levels effectively.
meanings.sent3: The statin was like a gatekeeper, blocking the cholesterol from entering the bloodstream.
meanings.sent4: His daily statin was a shield, protecting his heart from high cholesterol.
meanings.sent5: The statin acted as a guardian, keeping the cholesterol monster at bay in his body.
